title: Fail to migrate VM with attached volume

comments.content:
when migrate VM with attached volume

code trace:

2012-05-31 14:12:41 INFO nova.compute.manager [-] [instance: 9e8b504d-c5be-47fa-adbc-5548df4fe556] post_live_migration() is started..
2012-05-31 14:12:41 ERROR nova.utils [-] in looping call

2012-05-31 14:12:41 TRACE nova.utils     bdm['volume_id'])
